paragraph.paragraph: You will want to rely not on a single metric but on a combination of metrics:
paragraph.note: Metric framework: A metric framework is a set of definitions of metrics.
paragraph.paragraph: Any metric work should be backed by a theory:
paragraph.note: Metric theory: A metric theory is a combination of: - A metric framework - A set of definitions of attributes (qualitative or quantitative) - A mapping from the framework to the set of attributes, representing the hypothesis that each metric is a good predictor of the associated attribute
paragraph.paragraph: This note does not introduce a metric theory, but defines a metric framework by introducing a number of metrics.
